column1: Little Goat Diner////This dish was incredible
column3: and left us wanting more! After much discussion
column4: we agree that this was the most unusual and best thing we ordered. This breakfast burrito was made of an indian flatbread and filled with mashed potatoes
column8: and then topped with frisee and kidney bean salad that was tossed in a vinaigrette. It will be difficult for us to return to Little Goat without ordering this dish!
